data.text: Hey. Meet the new Editor inspired by Wordpress GutenBerg blocks and EditorJS. On this page you can see it in action — try to edit this text.

items: It returns clean data output in JSON
Designed to be extendable and pluggable with a simple API

data.text: Workspace in classic editors is made of a single contenteditable element, used to create different HTML markups. The workspace consists of separate Blocks: paragraphs, headings, images, lists, quotes, etc</mark>. Each of them is an independent contenteditable element. Inside blocks there's a sanitizer to protect you from certain attacks.
What does it mean clean data output
Classic WYSIWYG-editors produce raw HTML-markup with both content data and content appearance. On the contrary, this editor outputs JSON object with data of each Block.
Clean data is useful to sanitize, validate and process on the backend.
I know I've said this already, but I can no enfasize it enough, please check EditorJS platform for a plain Javascript example of this editor as they have made an amazing work on it.
